model.comment: Fits Atlas N Scale: SD50 SD60
Fits Atlas N Scale: B23-7, B30-7, B36-7, C628, C630, Dash8-32BW, Dash8-40B, Dash8-40BW and GP-38. Fits Atlas DCC Ready: GP-40, GP-40-2, SD-7, SD-9, SD-35, Trainmaster and U25B
Fits Atlas N Scale: B23-7, B30-7, B36-7, C628, C630, Dash8-32BW, Dash8-40B, Dash8-40BW and GP-38. Fits Atlas DCC Ready: GP-40, GP-40-2, SD-7, SD-9, SD-35, Trainmaster and U25B
Fits Classic N locos with split lighting board, 2 functions
Fits GP-style N locos with split lighting board, 4 functions
UK version of DP2X different pin orientation - fits Atlas vacuumcar
Z-scale 4 function A format drop in with two LEDs
Fits Z thru light duty HO

variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at Speed Step 1, range 0(default)-255
variable.comment: Range 0-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration
variable.label: Start voltage

variable.tooltip: Sets the acceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Accel 1 Rate

variable.tooltip: Sets the deceleration rate (delay or momentum), range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Decel 1 Rate

variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at top throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default)-255
variable.comment: Range 0-255, A value of 255 corresponds to 100%. 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration
variable.label: Maximum Voltage

variable.tooltip: sets the motor voltage at midrange throttle Speed Setting, range 0(default)-255
variable.comment: Range 0-255, 0 in CV 2, 6, 5 produces straight line acceleration
variable.label: Midpoint Voltage

variable.tooltip: =41-46 for all TCS with Back EMF models, Read Only
variable.label: Version ID

variable.tooltip: =153 for TCS, Read Only
variable.label: Manufacturer ID

variable.tooltip: turn off BEMF above this speed step, range 0(default-128)
variable.label: BEMF Cut Out

variable.tooltip: To unlock a decoder make CV15=0 or CV15=CV16
variable.label: Decoder Lock control number

variable.tooltip: This loco runs Normal(default) or Reversed(address+128) when in the consist
variable.label: Consist Direction

variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Forward
variable.label: Consist Address Active For White

variable.item: Consist Address Active For FL in Reverse
variable.label: Consist Address Active For Yellow

variable.tooltip: Values above 128 increase adjustment, below 128 decrease adjustment
variable.label: Consist Acceleration Adjustment

variable.tooltip: Values above 128 increase adjustment, below 128 decrease adjustment
variable.label: Consist Deceleration Adjustment

variable.tooltip: '4' bit. Allows the loco to run on DC, default is Off
variable.label: Analog conversion mode

variable.tooltip: Range 1 (high) to 10 (low)
variable.label: Dither Frequency

variable.tooltip: Practical range is 5 (low) to 50 (high)
variable.label: Dither Amplitude

variable.tooltip: Turn off/on(default) BEMF, enabling BEMF disables Dither
variable.label: BEMF Enable

variable.tooltip: Disable(default)/Enable button control of BEMF
variable.label: Enable BEMF Button Control

variable.tooltip: Disable(default)/Enable button control of Brake
variable.label: Enable Brake Button Control

variable.tooltip: Motor controlled by Function button
variable.label: Motor Button Control

variable.tooltip: If motor button control is active
variable.label: Button Control Direction

variable.tooltip: 1 second = 60 to 4 seconds = 255
variable.label: Momentary Pulse

variable.tooltip: 1 second = about 12
variable.label: Ditch Light Blink Holdover Time

variable.tooltip: 16 = 50% for incandescent bulbs, 2-6 for LEDs
variable.label: Dimming Brightness

variable.tooltip: Sets the Decel 3 end point, range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Decel 2 Ending Point

variable.tooltip: Sets the Decel 3 rate, range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Decel 2 Rate

variable.tooltip: Sets the Decel 2 End point, range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Decel 3 Ending Point

variable.tooltip: Sets the Decel 2 rate, range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Decel 3 Rate

variable.tooltip: Sets the Accel 2 start point, range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Accel 2 Starting Point

variable.tooltip: Sets the Accel 2 rate, range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Accel 2 Rate

variable.tooltip: Sets the Accel 3 start point, range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Accel 3 Starting Point

variable.tooltip: Sets the Accel 3 rate, range 0(default)-255
variable.label: Accel 3 Rate

variable.tooltip: If button control of motor is active, range 0-255
variable.label: Power to button controlled motor

variable.tooltip: Random Flicker for fireboxes
variable.label: Random Flicker Control

variable.tooltip: Date TCS made this decoder
variable.label: Month of Decoder Manufacture

variable.tooltip: Date TCS made this decoder
variable.label: Day of Decoder Manufacture

variable.tooltip: Date TCS made this decoder
variable.label: Year of Decoder Manufacture

label.text: If Accel 2 and 3 Rate and Starting Points are set to zero, then Accel Rate 1 applies to whole speed range
If Decel 2 and 3 Rate and Ending Points are set to zero, then Decel Rate 1 applies to whole speed range
If Brake Button Control active, Decel 2 Rate applies when button active and Decel 1 Rate applies to throttle reduction
Values above 128 increase speed. Values below 128 decrease speed
TCS decoders support a decoder locking feature
useful when several decoders are used in one loco
on the same address, e.g. for adding sound
Set CV15 equal to this number to unlock the decoder for programming
TCS_V51.xml for TCS 'X' with BEMF, v51-52. July 17 2010
